effect.shortEffect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.
effect.full: Whenever this Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, the Pokémon who gave this Pokémon that ailment is also given the ailment. This ability passes back bad poison when this Pokémon is badly poisoned. This ability cannot pass on a status ailment that the Pokémon did not directly receive from another Pokémon, such as the poison from toxic spikes or the burn from a flame orb. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, wild Pokémon have a 50% chance of having the lead Pokémon's nature, and a 50% chance of being given a random nature as usual, including the lead Pokémon's nature. This does not work on Pokémon received outside of battle or roaming legendaries.

description.diamond-pearl: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
description.platinum: Passes on a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.

description.black-white: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
description.black-2-white-2: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
description.x-y: Passes poison, paralyze, or burn to the Pokémon that inflicted it.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Passes poison, paralyze, or burn to the Pokémon that inflicted it.
description.sun-moon: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.

description.sword-shield: The attacker will receive the same status condition if it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokémon.
